thread.section_title: Amazon Japan評価／レビュー | お客様は Amazon Japanの評価／レビューをしました。 | www.amazon.co.jp
thread.title: Felicia Tan
thread.title_full: Amazon Japan について 投稿者 Felicia Tan

author: Felicia Tan
title: Felicia Tan
text: Excellent service! I thought nothing of it when it stated that shipping and delivery would take 2 days (because overseas shipping is quite haphazard, right?) Who knew in 2 days I get a call from Fed Ex to say that there better be someone home to collect my parcel! I was so pleased! The packaging was excellent, and well protected and I can't be happier with my purchase experience. Definitely worth it.
